1.title: Software development internship
1.description: Development of a prototype web application with React, Next.js, and Tailwind. Implementation of a showcase for a shift register using the Calliope Mini. Backend development in Java with Javalin. Solid understanding of serial to parallel data conversion using the "74HC595" shift register.

2.title: Software development internship
2.description: Development of a GTA for the Calliope Mini using JavaScript following code style guidelines. Creation of a project brief and evaluation of a REST API in Kotlin.

1.description: This portfolio presents my journey and work as a fullstack software engineer, featuring hands-on experience with modern web technologies.
